bug.author: erip
bug.summary: SentencePrediction undefined var causes `TypeError: join() argument must be str or bytes, not 'type'`
bug.description:

does not refer to a python name <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pytorch/fairseq/blob/9e4088bc3d2630d5a4285138662fed4426190e73/fairseq/tasks/sentence_prediction.py#L132>here</denchmark-link> and thus causes an error because it falls back to <denchmark-h:h3>To Reproduce</denchmark-h>
